Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 3rd overall pick, by Atlanta in 1966...
Traded from Atlanta to Pittsburgh on 1/31/1968 (Going to PIT: CF L. Hisle, RF J. Hague. Going to ATL: CF R. Clemente)...
Injured on 4/3/1969 with a Stiff Neck, out for 5 days...
Injured on 5/12/1969 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Injured on 8/12/1969 with a Bruised Neck, out for 5 days...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1970, off Paul Edmondson (LA)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/2/1970, off Clay Carroll (ATL)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1970...
Drove in 6 runs against New York (N) on 5/24/1972...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/15/1973, hitting .481 with 4 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 7/9/1975 with a Pulled Calf Muscle, out for 3 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1975, hitting .424 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/6/1975, hitting .500 with 2 HR, 6 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1975...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/9/1976, hitting .556 with 2 HR, 8 RBI...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Chicago (N) on 10/1/1976...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1976...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/7/1977, hitting .423 with 4 HR, 14 RBI...
Drove in 6 runs against San Francisco on 5/11/1977...
Was selected to the 1977 Allstar game...
Had 5 hits with 5 RBI against New York (N) on 8/26/1977...
Won MVP Award in 1977, hitting .289 with 21 HR, 111 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1977...
Had 5 hits with 2 RBI against Los Angeles on 9/6/1978...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1978...
Hit for the cycle against St. Louis on 9/5/1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/8/1979, hitting .467 with 2 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1979...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/1980, hitting .333 with 5 HR, 25 RBI...
Injured on 8/11/1980 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1980...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/8/1981 to a 2-year deal worth $10,000,000 per year...
Traded from Texas to Cleveland on 7/31/1981 (Going to TEX: 2B C. Walker, P E. Vande Berg, P S. Bahnsen, P G. Zahn. Going to CLE: CF L. Hisle, 3B K. Oberkfell)...
Had 2000th career hit on 8/13/1981, off Bill Atkinson (CHW)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Centerfield in 1981...
Injured on 9/20/1982 with a Broken Wrist, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 5/5/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $848,000 per year...
